title.narrative: Innovation component: testing what works for supporting people with disabilities and generating evidence of effectiveness

description.narrative: This activity (Innovation component: testing what works for supporting people with disabilities and generating evidence of effectiveness) is a component of Disability Inclusive Development Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £6,409,413. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Democratic participation and civil society, Human rights. , with the following implementing partners: Sightsavers. The start date is 05-07-2018 and the end date is 31-12-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Justice, Law and Order - Justice, Law, Order and Security - Justice, Law and Order - immigration
Other General Services - General Public Service - Other General Services - support to civil society
